transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hello? Haan ji, haan ji sir.

Executive: Sir, Aakib ji baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Ji, Aakib ji baat kar rahe hain. Aakib ji, very good afternoon sir. Ha, Praveen Sharma baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se. Kaise hain sir aap?

Customer: Ji, main theek hoon. Aap theek hain? Aapke IndiaMART ki taraf se bilkul theek nahi hoon.

Executive: Batayiye sir, matlab humne to sir catalog bhi aapka dobara se revamp kara jaise jaise aapne bola tha.

Customer: Catalog, catalog ki baat nahi, baat catalog ki nahi. Aap mere profile kholiye, usko check kijiye. Mere sath IndiaMART ka package chal raha hai, mazak chal raha hai yaar. Do mahine ho gaye, ek order tak bhi confirm nahi ho raha. Wo leads bhi aisi aati hai, ek fitki, do fitki. Inquiry wali hoti hai, kuch inquiry wali hoti hai, kuch ke number off aate hain, kuch ke [inaudible].

Executive: Sir, aap bol rahe the ki maturity ka result.

Customer: [Unintelligible] maturity ki chhoti to.

Executive: Nahi sir, matlab main ye keh raha hoon sir, maturity ki guarantee to sir koi bhi nahi de sakta na sir. Koi bhi platform aap pure India mein utha lijiye sir.

Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Lekin kam se kam leads, leads jo aate hain kam se kam wo wali to aaye jo customer lene wale ho. Wo hamare upar depend karta hai ki hum usko kitne mein, matlab kis tarah se satisfy kare, kis tarah nahi.

Executive: Sir, main customer ki inquiry aati hai.

Customer: Ye wali aati hai to ye bolte hain hum log check kar rahe the. Koi bolta hai hamari kisi ne pata nahi kisi ne kar diya. Koi bolta ki ha batayenge 10 din baad, 30 din baad ya mahine baad, do mahine baad hum to abhi check kar rahe hain. Aur kisi ka number off aata.

Executive: Sir dekhiye kuch, dekhiye maine us din bhi sir aapse bola tha 10 din se do teen customer aise.

Customer: Meri baat suno, meri leads jo na, hafte mein, hafte mein jo leads aati hai na, unko main pura bhi nahi uthata isi wajah se ki utha ke main kya karun baat karke. Leads bhi aisi khatam ho jati hai. Maine pichle baar check kijiye, char panch lead aisi chali gayi, khatam ho gayi.

Executive: Sir, aap jo do teen din mein jo hai na.

Customer: Sir, din mein do teen kya karun unka? Sir ye bataye, main uthane ke liye utha lunga lekin un leads ko utha ke kya karun jo mere kaam ki nahi hai?

Executive: Nahi, jaise ye abhi aapko safety locker sirf safety locker ki 100 kg quantity ki 25 liter capacity ki lead aayi hai. Ye to sir sahi hai na, correct lead hai na sir ye?

Customer: Isse, isse main aapko, abhi aapko, aapko leke conference pe leke baat karun kya bolega kya nahi hai? Tab tab aapko yakin aayega?

Executive: Kariye sir. Ravastar Rajasthan wali lead uthaiye ek baar.

Customer: Pehle bhi maine kai baar aapke junior ko, senior ko unko bhi conference pe leke baat ki thi. Unhone sun liya to kya bolte hain kya? Abhi aapke paas dekho aapko bhi conference pe leke bhi baat karta hoon.

Executive: Ye Rajasthan wali lead uthaiye ek baar.

Customer: Main apni marzi se uthaunga. Aayega kya bataun ye log kare paanch paanch hazaar rupay mein likhiye kya karega? Singh gana Rajasthan char fit ke kuch 50 hazaar rupay itni ki to khane se bhi nahi.

Executive: Sir 50 hazaar ki 25 liter ki quantity hai matlab safety locker. To ye to theek hai na sir. Isme itna to matlab 20-25 hazaar ka isme hai. Aapko kitne order value ka chahiye minimum?

Customer: Are ek baat aur, main search kar, main search karta hoon yaar ki Bihar ke list mein kyun nahi dikh rahi? 150 nahi ho rahi, pata nahi kya karte hain kya nahi. Pehle to ho bhi rahi thi.

Executive: Kahan ki, kahan ki lead nahi?

Customer: Ho rahi hai aapko? Main kahin, main kahin ke bhi state ka search karta hoon, aati nahi hai ek bhi lead.

Executive: Sir maine abhi India kar raha hai. Mujhe Assam ki lead dikh rahi hai pehli lead safety locker ki.

Customer: Assam ke nahi leni na bhai jaan. Bade bhai mujhe Assam ke nahi leni. Maine to char panch state bataye the jaise UP, Haryana, Delhi, Bihar, Jharkhand, Jammu Kashmir, Punjab, Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh. Ye, ye kuch state maine batayi thi. Maine all India ka nahi karaya aur na hi maine all India ke liye bola.

Executive: Nahi sir ye all India package hai lead aapko sari dikhti hai. Main ek baar sari state se bhi search kar lete hain na sir. Abhi ek double door security safe ki lead available hai. Robertganj Uttar Pradesh se. 40 liter double door.

Executive: Ye lead dekhiye isme matlab unka mobile number bhi verified hai sir.

Customer: Pehle to main search karta hoon Bihar ke. Aaj Bihar ke ek bhi search se nahi ho rahi.

Executive: Sir abhi Uttar Pradesh wali utha lijiye na.

Customer: [Unintelligible] de raha hoon dekho ye dikh rahi hai. Bihar ki ek bhi lead kyun nahi kar rahi? Sab Delhi, Haryana, Delhi, Haryana.

Customer: [Unintelligible]

Executive: Kaun si uthai hai sir aapne? Mujhe naam batayiyega.

Customer: Ab jaise ki main Bihar search karta hoon na. Bihar search karta hoon usko okay karta hoon Delhi ki list aati hai Bihar ki nahi aati.

Executive: Sir Bihar mein available nahi hogi na koi dusri state daal dijiye.

Customer: Koi dusri state ek baar Bulandshahar aapne kya kya bataya tha Bulandshahar bhi bataya tha na aapne?

Executive: Ek minute sir check karta hoon aapke liye uske baad.

Customer: Delhi, Delhi search kar lijiye ya phir Delhi ki to already pehle hi aa rahi hai.

Customer: Jammu Kashmir ki kar raha hoon ye nahi aa rahi.

Executive: Nahi 250 liter ki dekhiye four door jewelry safe Delhi. 250 liter badi lead hai ye.

Customer: Aap koi jab lead uthaye to mujhe batayiye kaun si lead uthai hai aapne ek baar. Kaun si uthane ja rahe hain?

Customer: Pehle to, pehle to ye check karo ki jo main search kar raha hoon wahan ki lead kyun nahi aa rahi?

Customer: Jo lead, jisme main search kar raha hoon, jo bhi state search kar raha hoon wo search nahi aa raha wo leads nahi aati wahan ki. Main Himachal ki, sorry Himachal Pradesh ki kar rahi wahan ki koi leads nahi aa rahi. Jammu Kashmir kar raha hoon wahan ke koi option nahi aa raha matlab leads nahi aa rahi. Bihar ka kar raha hoon wahan ke koi leads nahi aa rahi. Jharkhand kar raha hoon wahan koi leads nahi aa rahi. Total Delhi ki hi aa rahi hai.

Customer: Bhai aise kaam karte hain ji hamara taki hum kuch, 10 minute, 15 minute. To bhai sahab ek kaam kar do aap apne do months pure nahi hue hain. Do months ke apne paise kaat ke hamare paise wapas kara do aap.

Executive: Sir but aap ek cheez sochiye aap soch rahe hain ki matlab har lead mein aapka conversion ho jaye. Sir dekhiye mehanga product.

Customer: Har lead ko chori pade. Bade bhai, bade bhai meri baat suno. Bade, bade bhai wo baat aapki theek hai lekin products ko chori products to paanch paanch crore ke liye ek ek crore ke bhi products hain. Theek hai rahi dusri baat ye pehle bola tha ki 15 din mein result nahi aayega. Fir bolega mujhse ki ek mahine mein result nahi aayega. Ab to mere bhai do mahino ke pure hone ko aaye abhi bhi koi result nahi aayega kya?

Executive: Aap ek lead utha ke mujhe recording bhejiye na aap kaun kis pe baat kar rahe hain. Ek baar, ek baar abhi baat karenge kisi lead pe.

Customer: Aap India, India lagaiye, India ka filter lagaiye. [Unintelligible]

Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. Tabas shighra hi hoga.

Customer: Ab aap contact karo ye asthai roop mein nahi hai number. Wo bhi leads kharab meri?

Executive: Kya hua sir?

Customer: Jo maine abhi lead uthai hai na. Haan ji. Wo number asthai roop mein nahi hai. Kya karunga batao ab main? Agar, agar aapko yakin nahi ho raha jo leads maine uthai uska number main aapko deta hoon, screenshot deta hoon aap call kar lijiyega.

Customer: Aap dijiye mujhe main check kar raha hoon ek baar WhatsApp pe main highlight kar raha hoon. Main aapko screenshot bhej raha hoon. Bhai main to bahut pareshaan hoon. Ye [unintelligible] time diya. Tab ek baar hume kal batayiyega. [Unintelligible] screenshot bhejta hoon aapko. Main to bahut pareshaan hoon. [Unintelligible]

Customer: Ab lead maine jaise aa jaiye aap. [Unintelligible]

Customer: Mujhe WhatsApp pe hai lekin main screenshot deta hoon maine abhi lead uthai hai.

Customer: Aap call karo asthai, asthai roop se hi baar bata raha number ko.

Executive: Ek lead aur utha lijiye sir, koi dusri lead utha lijiye ek baar. Chalo wo bhi tumhari swaichik hai. Ek minute baat hai ye call is kharab ho gayi.

Customer: Agar aap ye soch rahe hain matlab har, sir dekhiye mehanga product hai customer aap.

Executive: Bhai sahab mehenge ki chori wo mere upar depend karta hai, wo mere upar depend karta hai. Wo bhi to jo lene wale hote hain unko pata hota hai ki mehanga hai sasta hota hai unko lene pata hota hai sir bhai. Main kya uthaun Delhi, phir Delhi ki aa rahi hai bhai main kya karun utha ke yaar. Do do liter ki main utha ke kya hai ye 9000 rupay ki lead utha ke main kya karunga yaar? Jis product sell karta hoon do do lakh rupay mein. Bhai mujhe bilkul ab ab mujhe check leads kaun si leads aa rahi hai bhai ja check karo yaar. Dekhna ek ek wo aa rahi hai char char paanch paanch hazaar rupay ki leads aa rahi hai. Kya karun utha ke dekho aap check karo. Mera bhai paise wapas karao. Nahi bhai main ha main WhatsApp pe bhej raha hoon aapko screenshot mere paise wapas karao do month ke kaat ke.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with lead quality and lack of conversions.

- Frustrated with leads having incorrect or inactive numbers.

- Expresses concern over not getting leads from desired states.

- Requests a refund for the subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check leads from specific states.

- Executive suggested checking verified leads.

- Executive offered to connect on a conference call.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer requested a refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, state
